plugin.name: iPeng
plugin.title: iPeng
plugin.desc: A Skin optimized for iPhone and iPod touch. Not intended to replace any main skin for PC/MAC. See manual at http://penguinlovesmusic.com
plugin.creator: Joerg Schwieder

plugin.name: YouTube
plugin.title: YouTube
plugin.desc: Play audio from YouTube videos. WARNING: this plugin will use more network bandwidth than other streaming services as the entire video is being streamed even though only the audio is played.
